scenes.description: Momosuzu Nene performs her song 'Momonone' during her 1st anniversary 3D live.
Nene finishes the song and talks to the audience before moving to the next stage.
A transition skit featuring Nekko characters on a park bench during sunset.

subtitles.original: まっすぐ伸びて行け
subtitles.english: Go straight and grow tall

subtitles.original: あの空に届くように
subtitles.english: So that it reaches that sky

subtitles.original: もう怖いものなんてない
subtitles.english: There's nothing to be afraid of anymore

subtitles.original: 目一杯咲かせるよ
subtitles.english: I'll make it bloom with all my might

subtitles.original: 自分という名の大きな花
subtitles.english: A big flower named "me"

subtitles.original: 満開のモモノネ
subtitles.english: Momonone in full bloom

subtitles.original: いくつもの夢という花が
subtitles.english: Many flowers called dreams

subtitles.original: つぼみのまま咲くのを待ってる
subtitles.english: Are waiting to bloom from their buds

subtitles.original: 雨の中でも風の中でも
subtitles.english: Even in the rain, even in the wind

subtitles.original: 大事に大事に育ててきた
subtitles.english: I've raised them carefully, so carefully

subtitles.original: しぼんじゃいそうな時も
subtitles.english: Even when I feel like I'm about to wither

subtitles.original: たくさん元気をくれるねっ子
subtitles.english: The Nekko give me so much energy

subtitles.original: だからまだ全然枯れたりしない
subtitles.english: So I won't wither at all just yet

subtitles.original: 想いは太陽の光浴びて
subtitles.english: My feelings bathe in the sunlight

subtitles.original: 鮮やかに輝くよ
subtitles.english: And shine brilliantly

subtitles.original: 空を全部覆うほど
subtitles.english: Enough to cover the whole sky

subtitles.original: 目一杯この両手
subtitles.english: With these hands spread

subtitles.original: 広げてさ
subtitles.english: Out as wide as possible

subtitles.original: みんながいればなんでもできるよ
subtitles.english: With everyone here, I can do anything

subtitles.original: 想いはまっすぐ伸びて行け
subtitles.english: May my feelings go straight and grow tall

subtitles.original: あの空に届くように
subtitles.english: So that they reach that sky

subtitles.original: もう怖いものなんてない
subtitles.english: There's nothing to be afraid of anymore

subtitles.original: 目一杯咲かせるよ
subtitles.english: I'll make it bloom with all my might

subtitles.original: みんなで咲かそうたくさんの花
subtitles.english: Let's all make many flowers bloom

subtitles.original: 満開のモモノネ
subtitles.english: Momonone in full bloom

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: というわけで、初披露の曲、えー、「モモノネ」を聴いていただきました。
subtitles.english: And so, you just heard the first performance of my song "Momonone".

subtitles.original: いかがでしたでしょうか？
subtitles.english: How did you like it?

subtitles.original: この曲、なんと思ったみんな？
subtitles.english: Everyone, what did you think of this song?

subtitles.original: なんと思った？詳細知りたいでしょ？
subtitles.english: What did you think? You want to know the details, right?

subtitles.original: 知りたいでしょ？知りたいでしょ？
subtitles.english: You want to know, don't you? You want to know?

subtitles.original: というわけで、この曲の詳細と、ねねからのお知らせ2つを紹介するために、
subtitles.english: So, to introduce the details of this song and two announcements from Nene,

subtitles.original: ステージを移動していきたいと思いますので、
subtitles.english: I'm going to move to a different stage.

subtitles.original: ちょっと長めなんだけど、
subtitles.english: It'll take a little while, but...

subtitles.original: みんな今日もね、あのスタッフさんたちがねっ子を使って寸劇作ってくれましたので、
subtitles.english: ...the staff members have put together a short skit using the Nekko today as well,

subtitles.original: みんなちょっと考えながら見てみてね。
subtitles.english: So please watch it and try to guess what's happening.

subtitles.original: というわけで、レッツゴー！
subtitles.english: And with that, let's go!
